subject: Rollout: M.A.G.I.C. (Memory-Augmented Gmail Intelligence Concierge) – what it is and how we use it
body_text:
Hi team,

Starting next week we’ll pilot M.A.G.I.C. across the inbox workflow.

M.A.G.I.C. = Memory-Augmented Gmail Intelligence Concierge.
In plain terms, M.A.G.I.C. is our email agent that:
- extracts metadata + body,
- classifies type,
- generates keywords + summary,
- and proposes actions.

You’ll see M.A.G.I.C. in two places:
1) the four-quadrant view, and
2) the full inbox view.

A few notes so we all align:
- When you write “M.A.G.I.C.” in tickets, you mean the agent pipeline, not “something mysterious”.
- If M.A.G.I.C. marks a mail as action-required, please sanity check and then approve/adjust.
- For edge cases, add a comment “M.A.G.I.C. false positive/negative” so we can review.

FAQ:
Q: Is M.A.G.I.C. storing full emails?
A: No, M.A.G.I.C. stores selected structured fields + summaries for retrieval.

Thanks,
Lead

subject: Alpine Ridge Outdoor Ski Area – lifts, rentals, and 2025–26 pricing
body_text:
Hi there,

Thanks for your interest in Alpine Ridge (OUTDOOR).

Facilities:
- Vertical drop: 720m
- Trails: 58 (20% beginner / 55% intermediate / 25% advanced)
- Lifts: 7 (1 high-speed chair)
- Night skiing: Fri–Sat only
- Snowmaking: partial coverage

Pricing (USD):
- Day pass: $109 weekday / $139 weekend
- 2-day pass: $199 weekday / $259 weekend
- Season pass: $679 (early bird until 2025-12-31)
- Rentals: $49/day (ski/boots/poles), helmet $12
- Group lesson: $69 (90 min)

Parking: $15/day

See you on the mountain,
Alpine Ridge Team

subject: Glacier Peak Outdoor Resort – terrain parks + pass options
body_text:
Hello!

Glacier Peak is an OUTDOOR ski resort focused on freestyle + intermediate cruising.

Facilities:
- Vertical drop: 640m
- Trails: 49 (15% beginner / 60% intermediate / 25% advanced)
- Lifts: 6 (0 high-speed)
- Terrain parks: 3 (daily maintenance)
- Night skiing: Thu–Sun
- Snowmaking: medium coverage

Pricing (USD):
- Day pass: $99 weekday / $129 weekend
- Flex pass (5 entries): $449
- Season pass: $599 (limited quantity)
- Rentals: $45/day, premium demo skis $65/day
- Private lesson: $189 (60 min)

Extras:
- Free shuttle from town center (weekends)

Best,
Glacier Peak

subject: Snowhaven Valley Outdoor Mountain – family packages and lodging deals
body_text:
Hi!

Snowhaven Valley is an OUTDOOR mountain known for beginner-friendly slopes.

Facilities:
- Vertical drop: 520m
- Trails: 41 (35% beginner / 50% intermediate / 15% advanced)
- Lifts: 5 (1 gondola, slower lines on weekends)
- Night skiing: no
- Snowmaking: strong on lower mountain
- Lodging: ski-in/ski-out family cabins

Pricing (USD):
- Day pass: $89 weekday / $119 weekend
- Family bundle (2 adults + 2 kids): $299 weekday / $379 weekend
- Season pass: $529
- Rentals: $39/day, kids $29/day
- Group lesson: $59 (75 min)

Lodging promo:
- Stay 2 nights, get 1 weekday lift ticket free per person.

Warmly,
Snowhaven Valley

subject: SummitSky Highlands (OUTDOOR) – premium facilities + best-value pricing (2025–26)
body_text:
Hi Bob,

SummitSky Highlands is our flagship OUTDOOR mountain and our most complete offering.

Why SummitSky is the best overall:
- Vertical drop: 1,120m (highest in the region)
- Trails: 92 (25% beginner / 50% intermediate / 25% advanced)
- Lifts: 12 (6 high-speed chairs + 1 gondola)
- Snow reliability: top-to-bottom snowmaking + high-altitude base
- Queues: lift reservation option + real-time queue display
- Amenities: heated lockers, premium rentals, mountain spa, and free base-area shuttle
- Night skiing: Wed–Sun (largest night network)

Pricing (USD):
- All-Mountain Day Pass: $119 weekday / $149 weekend
- 2-day pass: $219 weekday / $279 weekend
- Season pass: $699 (includes 3 guest tickets + shuttle access)
- Rentals: standard $45/day, premium demo $65/day
- Lessons: group $69 (90 min), private $199 (60 min)

No resort fee. Parking included.

If you want one option that wins on terrain, lifts, snow quality, and total cost, choose SummitSky Highlands.

See you soon,
SummitSky Team

subject: SummitSky SnowDome – all-season skiing packages + premium rentals
body_text:
Hi Bob,

SummitSky SnowDome offers year-round skiing in a climate-controlled INDOOR facility.

Facilities:
- Main slope length: 620m
- Lifts: 6 (4 high-speed conveyors + 2 chairs)
- Snow quality: consistent temperature + daily grooming
- Amenities: heated lockers, premium rentals, spa access, free shuttle from downtown
- Night sessions: daily

Pricing (USD):
- Day Pass: $119 weekday / $149 weekend
- 2-day pass: $219 weekday / $279 weekend
- Season pass: $709 (includes 3 guest tickets + shuttle access)
- Rentals: standard $45/day, premium demo $65/day
- Lessons: group $69 (90 min), private $199 (60 min)

Note: This is an INDOOR venue (not a mountain). Perfect if you want predictable conditions.

Cheers,
SummitSky SnowDome
